word_mean: 变异：在遗传学上指个体的性质发生变异，已无其所属种群的典型特性
也指子代的特性不同于其亲代者
月球运动里因太阳和地球引力的联合作用而产生的周期为半个朔望月的摄动项。
群体中个体之间的差异。
亲代与子代间或群体内不同个体间基因型或表型的差异。
亲代与子代间或群体内不同个体间基因型或表型的差异。

sentence.Network_en: This delicious variation on an omelette is quick and easy to prepare.

sentence.Network_en: Variation among humans is limited to the possible permutations of our genes.
sentence.Network_cn: 人类的变异受限于我们的基因可能存在哪些排列。

sentence.Network_en: The petitioner ask for a variation in her maintenance order.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting variance or conflict): from Old French, or from Latin variatio(n-), from the verb variare (see vary)

encyclopedia.content: 变奏曲是指主题及其一系列变化反复，并按照统一的艺术构思而组成的乐曲。“变奏”一词，源出拉丁语variatio,原义是变化，意即主题的演变。从古老的固定低音变奏曲到近代的装饰变奏曲和自由变奏曲，所用的变奏手法各不相同。作曲家可新创主题，也可借用现成曲调。然后保持主题的基本骨架而加以自由发挥。手法有装饰变奏、对应变奏、曲调变奏、音型变奏、卡农变奏、和声变奏、特性变奏等。另外，还可以在拍子、速度、调性等方面加以变化而成一段变奏。变奏少则数段。多则数十段。变奏曲可作为独立的作品，也可作为大型作品的一个乐章。

entry.def: A variation on something is the same thing presented in a slightly different form.

example.ex: This delicious variation on an omelette is quick and easy to prepare...
example.tran: 这种稍加变化的可口煎蛋卷做起来又快又容易。

example.ex: Many theories on punishment exist, all of which are variations on a theme.
example.tran: 关于惩罚的理论有很多，虽形式略有不同，但其主旨都是一样的。

entry.tran: （等级或数量的）变化，变动，变更
entry.def: A variation is a change or slight difference in a level, amount, or quantity.

example.ex: The survey found a wide variation in the prices charged for canteen food...
example.tran: 调查发现食堂饭菜的价格相差很大。

example.ex: Every day without variation my grandfather ate a plate of cold ham.
example.tran: 我的祖父每天都会吃一盘冷火腿，雷打不动。

means.word_mean: 1. an instance of change; the rate or magnitude of change
2. an activity that varies from a norm or standard;

sentences.sentence: "any variation in his routine was immediately reported"

means.word_mean: 3. a repetition of a musical theme in which it is modified or embellished
4. something a little different from others of the same type;

sentences.sentence: "an experimental version of the night fighter"
"an emery wheel is a modern variant of the grindstone"
"the boy is a younger edition of his father"

means.word_mean: 5. an artifact that deviates from a norm or standard;

sentences.sentence: "he patented a variation on the sandal"

means.word_mean: 6. the angle (at a particular location) between magnetic north and true north
7. (astronomy) any perturbation of the mean motion or orbit of a planet or satellite (especially a perturbation of the earth's moon)
8. (biology) an organism that has characteristics resulting from chromosomal alteration
9. (ballet) a solo dance or dance figure
10. the act of changing or altering something slightly but noticeably from the norm or standard;

sentences.sentence: "who is responsible for these variations in taxation?"

means.word_mean: 变化, 变动(的程度); （数量、水平等的）变化, 变更, 变异

sentences.en: The dial records very slight variations in pressure.
sentences.cn: 刻盘显示出压力有微小变化。

jushi.english: There is a temperature variation of 10° between last week and this week.
jushi.chinese: 上周和本周的气温差十度。
